name: Invoice Event Process
xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" id="Definitions_15hceqv" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="Camunda Modeler" exporterVersion="2.0.3">
  <bpmn:process id="Process_hlk8u6pxbqw" name="Invoice Event Process" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="StartEvent_1" name="Invoice received">
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_14cguod</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:exclusiveGateway id="Gateway_1lhx7yu">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_1h0tkwi</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_04ayntv</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_04xiak3</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:exclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_14cguod" sourceRef="StartEvent_1" targetRef="Activity_0o6lc8c" />
    <bpmn:endEvent id="Event_1hfbqbx" name="Invoice processed">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_04ayntv</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_04ayntv" sourceRef="Gateway_1lhx7yu" targetRef="Event_1hfbqbx" />
    <bpmn:endEvent id="Event_0gyjtyu" name="Invoice not processed">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_04xiak3</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_04xiak3" sourceRef="Gateway_1lhx7yu" targetRef="Event_0gyjtyu" />
    <bpmn:task id="Activity_0o6lc8c" name="Approve Invoice">
      <bpmn:incoming>Flow_14cguod</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>Flow_1h0tkwi</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="Flow_1h0tkwi" sourceRef="Activity_0o6lc8c" targetRef="Gateway_1lhx7yu" />
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_1">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_1" bpmnElement="Process_hlk8u6pxbqw">
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_04xiak3_di" bpmnElement="Flow_04xiak3">
        <di:waypoint x="290" y="142" />
        <di:waypoint x="290" y="230" />
        <di:waypoint x="372" y="230" />
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_04ayntv_di" bpmnElement="Flow_04ayntv">
        <di:waypoint x="315" y="117" />
        <di:waypoint x="372" y="117" />
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_14cguod_di" bpmnElement="Flow_14cguod">
        <di:waypoint x="-32" y="117" />
        <di:waypoint x="60" y="117" />
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="Flow_1h0tkwi_di" bpmnElement="Flow_1h0tkwi">
        <di:waypoint x="160" y="117" />
        <di:waypoint x="265" y="117" />
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="Gateway_1lhx7yu_di" bpmnElement="Gateway_1lhx7yu" isMarkerVisible="true">
        <dc:Bounds x="265" y="92" width="50" height="50" />
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="Event_1hfbqbx_di" bpmnElement="Event_1hfbqbx">
        <dc:Bounds x="372" y="99" width="36" height="36" />
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <dc:Bounds x="345" y="142" width="90" height="14" />
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="Event_0gyjtyu_di" bpmnElement="Event_0gyjtyu">
        <dc:Bounds x="372" y="212" width="36" height="36" />
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <dc:Bounds x="363" y="255" width="55" height="27" />
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="_BPMNShape_StartEvent_2" bpmnElement="StartEvent_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="-68" y="99" width="36" height="36" />
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <dc:Bounds x="-90" y="142" width="81" height="14" />
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="Activity_0o6lc8c_di" bpmnElement="Activity_0o6lc8c">
        <dc:Bounds x="60" y="77" width="100" height="80" />
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>
